Package pl.polsl.view

Class LottoBaseView

java.lang.Object
pl.polsl.view.LottoBaseView
public class LottoBaseView extends Object
View allows to see the lotto numbers in database structures.
Version:
2.0
Author:
Piotr Benio

    • showFrequency

      public void showFrequency(HashMap<Integer,Integer> frequency, HashMap<Integer,Integer> percents)
      Main printing method. Shows numbers from 1 to 40, frequency of them in database and percent of this numbers in whole base.
      Parameters:
      frequency - is a base with values and its frequencies
      percents - is a base with values and its percentages in database
